original_text: That will pay for the special bread on the table in the temple. It will also pay for grain offerings and burnt offerings each day, as well as offerings on Sabbath days, feasts at each new moon, and other festivals. We will also use it for the sin offerings that take away Israel's guilt. And we will use it for all the work in the temple of our God. 10: That will pay for the special bread on the table in the temple. It will also pay for grain offerings and burnt offerings each day, as well as offerings on Sabbath days, feasts at each new moon, and other festivals. We will also use it for the sin offerings that take away Israel's guilt. And we will use it for all the work in the temple of our God.
korean_text: 곧 진설병과 항상 드리는 소제와 항상 드리는 번제와 안식일과 초하루와 정한 절기에 쓸 것과 성물과 이스라엘을 위하는 속죄제와 우리 하나님의 전의 모든 일을 위하여 쓰게 하였고

sentences.original_text: That will pay for the special bread
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 특별한 빵의 값을 지불할 것이다

sentences.original_text: on the table in the temple
It will also pay for grain offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 또한 곡물 제물의 값을 지불할 것이다

sentences.original_text: as well as offerings on Sabbath days
We will also use it for the sin offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 또한 그것을 속죄 제물에 사용할 것이다

sentences.original_text: And we will use it for all the work
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 그것을 모든 일에 사용할 것이다

sentences.original_text: in the temple of our God
